thread.title: Alliance Technologies LLC in St. Louis Acquires Metro IT Solutions

title: Alliance Technologies LLC in St. Louis Acquires Metro IT Solutions
text: Alliance Technologies LLC in St. Louis Acquires Metro IT Solutions Metro IT acquisition will increase Alliance's footprint in St. Charles County, Lincoln County and Eastern Missouri. ST. LOUIS, MO, September 19,   Alliance Technologies, LLC. announces they have acquired Metro IT Solutions, an IT firm based in Lake St. Louis, MO. The acquisition adds dozens of clients to Alliance's customer base as the firm continues its expansion throughout the St. Louis Region and Eastern Missouri. Christopher DeLaquil, former owner of Metro IT Solutions, will join Alliance Technologies and serve as the firm's new Director of Client Services. DeLaquil will assist clients with IT management and support the client's core business strategy. "Metro IT Solutions and Chris have an outstanding reputation working with businesses throughout the St. Louis area, especially in the western suburbs," said James Canada, President of Alliance Technologies, LLC. "They have provided IT services for over 11 years to a large number of clients. This acquisition enables Alliance to continue our growth in St. Charles and Lincoln Counties, providing a variety of IT and Managed Services with a high level of expertise to local companies." Canada added that he is excited DeLaquil has joined the Alliance team. DeLaquil brings some 30 years of experience as a consultant, computer programmer and IT expert to the firm. About Alliance Technologies Alliance Technologies is an IT firm committed to providing world-class managed services, network solutions, staff augmentation and consulting solutions. They stand committed to providing quality processes, delivering high caliber customized solutions, presenting consultants with extensive professional experience, and empowering their consultants to provide the best service possible. With their Managed Services approach there are no complex formulas; instead they use a simple pay per use formula to keep the cost to your business predictable. Alliance Technologies understands their clients need to maintain a predictable IT cost structure. Their managed services approach allows your business to focus on driving revenue rather than managing technology. Alliance Technologies works to develop strong individual relationships with key decision makers in an effort to foster long-term partnerships and build continued confidence. The goal is to provide a solid return on investment for their clients and to deliver value at every turn. For additional information visit http://www.alliancetechnologiesllc.com or call 314-219-7887. # # # Read more Press Releases from Steve Turner:
